q: same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
